tool_description: Integral2u Inventory ERP Tools. Provides inventory management enterprise resource planning tools to aid in planning and achieving optimal inventory. Great for determining and forcasting inventory requirements. Algorithmic Best Case Per SKU profiling. Recommended ordering advice.
name: Integral2uInventory
title: Integral2uInventory

api_list.name: StockOrderAdviceMulti
api_list.description: StockOrderAdviceMultiallows for multiple products to have their StockOrderAdvice calculated.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/stock/stockorderadvicemulti"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BestCaseUsage
api_list.description:
Like BestCaseWeightedUsage this method will do the same but utilize various other forecasting methods to pick the best suited algorithm and parameters.

Always advised to use 3 min or 4 plus sales months history for usage forecasting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/forecasting/bestcaseusage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: WeightedUsage
api_list.description:
Returns the weighted usage of a an item give the sales per month where the closest month has the most importance.  
Example: Given 3 months sales {8,4,5}
the result would be ((8*3)+(4*2)+(5*1))/(3+2+1) = 6.1666...7

Always advised to use 3 min or 4 plus sales months history for usage forecasting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/forecasting/weightedusage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/forecasting/weightedusage"

        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: BestCaseWeightedUsage
api_list.description:
Using WeightedUsage this method will look at months prior to last to determine which range of months is best to use to forecast the next months based on distanced from used months compared to last month,
The usage using the most recent month is the computed.

Always advised to use 3 min or 4 plus sales months history for usage forecasting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com/Prod/api/v1/forecasting/bestcaseweightedusage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "integral2uinventory1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Turnover
